alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 15 at 8:31PM CST until December 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Sucarnoochee River At Livingston affecting Sumter County. .Flooding continues on the Sucarnoochee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Friday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sucarnoochee River At Livingston. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of farm lands around Livingston occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
